p: The high Li-ion conductivity of the CE53 composite and the formation of an SEI at a high temperature allow the battery to operate at RT. Therefore, after 65 cycles performed at 60 °C, the temperature of the test for the Li|CE53|TiS 2 cell decreased to RT. A 4 h rest has been applied in order to equilibrate the temperature. Figure 6 a shows the galvanostatic profiles using the same current density of 11.8 mA g –1 (C/20). For the sake of clarity, only selected galvanostatic profiles are shown.
